code_SemperKI.tasks.processTasks¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2024

Contains: Tasks that are needed for almost every process

and which shall be run in the background

Attributes¶

loggerError

Functions¶

code_SemperKI.tasks.processTasks.loggerError¶
code_SemperKI.tasks.processTasks.sendEMail(IDOfReceiver: str, notification: str, subject: list[str], message: list[str], processTitle: str) → None¶

Send an E-Mail asynchronously

Parameters:

  • IDOfReceiver (str) – ID of receiving user/orga

  • notification (str) – The notification setting

  • subject (str) – What the mail is about

  • message (str) – The actual message

  • processTitle (str) – What is the process called?

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None

  • session (Django Session Object) – The session of the user who clicked

Nothing

None

code_SemperKI.tasks.processTasks.sendProcessEMails(processObj: code_SemperKI.modelFiles.processModel.Process, contractorObj: Generic_Backend.code_General.connections.postgresql.pgProfiles.Organization, session)¶

Send the e-mails regarding the process on their merry way to the user and the contractor

Parameters:

  • processObj (Process) – The process belonging to the project

  • contractorObj (Organization) – The contractor that the process is send to

  • session (Django Session Object (dict-like)) – The session of the user

Returns:

Nothing

None
